metadata.Title: CVE-2023-47384 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: MP4Box GPAC v2.3-DEV-rev617-g671976fcc-master was discovered to contain a memory leak in the function gf_isom_add_chapter at /isomedia/isom_write.c. This vulnerability allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service (DoS) via a crafted MP4 file.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
